timeline.bodyText: @olenagerasimova maybe we can move this plugin configuration to pluginManagement of parent pom?
timeline.author: g4s8

replies.bodyText: @g4s8 like the idea and I'll submit PR to parent pom. Configuration (limits) then will be set up in each project individually
replies.author: olenagerasimova

+package com.artipie.http.rs;
+
+import com.artipie.http.hm.RsHasBody;
+import com.artipie.http.hm.RsHasStatus;
+import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
+import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
+import org.cactoos.list.ListOf;
+import org.hamcrest.Matcher;
+import org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert;
+import org.hamcrest.core.AllOf;
+import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
+
+/**
+ * Test for {@link RsWithBody}.
+ * @since 0.9
+ */
+final class RsWithBodyTest {
+
+    @Test
+    void createsOkWithBody() {
+        final byte[] body = "abc".getBytes();
+        MatcherAssert.assertThat(
+            new RsWithBody(ByteBuffer.wrap(body)),
+            new AllOf<>(
+                new ListOf<Matcher<? super RsWithBody>>(
+                    new RsHasBody(body),
+                    new RsHasStatus(RsStatus.OK)
+                )
+            )
+        );
+    }
+
+    @Test
+    void appendsBody() {
+        final String body = "def";
+        MatcherAssert.assertThat(
+            new RsWithBody(new RsWithStatus(RsStatus.CREATED), body, StandardCharsets.UTF_8),
+            new AllOf<>(
